overview:
André Tachian is the founder and CTO of Veduca, a company with the purpose of democratize top-quality education in Brazil via video-lectures from world-class universities.

André is responsible for development of new technologies and Veduca processes management.

André has an System Engineer degree from Federal University of São Carlos (UFSCAR, 1996). He worked for 20 years developing technologies for investment banking sector; last 2 years in investment risk at Itaú-BBA.

In September 2011, André started Veduca with Carlos Souza, Eduardo Zancul and Marcelo Mejlachowicz. Veduca is on-air since March 2012 and has already 5,000 video-classes from 13 universities. Website achieved more than half a million visits with zero investment in advertising, being profiled by the main media vehicles in Brazil.
